bill_title: permit certain persons to discharge pyrotechnics on land owned or leased by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks.
keywords: Department of Game, Fish and Parks

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to permit certain persons to discharge pyrotechnics on land owned or leased by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 34-37-11 be amended to read as follows: 34-37-11. No person may sell or cause to be sold, discharge or cause to be discharged, any pyrotechnics of any description whatever within the exterior boundaries of the Black Hills Forest Fire Protection District, national forest, national park, state forest, or any land owned or leased by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks. However, the secretary of the Department of Game, Fish and Parks may, by written authorization, permit the discharge of pyrotechnics, pyrotechnic displays, sales, or exhibits on land owned or leased by the department unless otherwise prohibited by statute. Any violation of this section which occurs on any land owned or leased by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks is a Class 2 misdemeanor. Any other subsequent violation of this chapter section is a Class 1 misdemeanor. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

bill_versions.bill_version: House Agriculture and Natural Resources Engrossed
